arguments.argument:
str[0] = "WAKE UP, PUNK!!!" str[1] = "AHHH! Guh! What happened?! How long have I been out?!" str[2] = "Oh, don't be silly. Nothing awful happened to you overnight. You were in your bed when the rest of us woke up. Sometimes I find sleeping scary too. I think it's weird that we need to sleep, and yet we don't need to eat or drink." str[3] = "Where is everybody?" str[4] = "They're out doing their things. We decided to let you sleep in a few hours because we figured you deserved a break after all of your hard work." str[5] = "Ah, thanks." str[6] = "No problem. Anyways, it's convenient that you woke up at this time. The next [AKS] meeting is soon." str[7] = "Uh, you're the one who screamed at me and woke me up." str[8] = "Oh well, close enough. Come on, let's go to the [AKS] building.*"
